comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: This LB-30 originally left San Diego as AM927; after a taxi accident during delivery to the RAF it was returned to the factory for repairs and reconfigured to C-87 configuration. Later it was 'plushed out' by Consolidated for use as a corporate transport (seen here). Today it survives with the Commemorative Air Force as 'Ole 927.'
